cells.raw:
# Thanks to: 
# https://www.kaggle.com/mauricef/titanic
# https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/titanic-top-3-one-line-of-the-prediction-code

df['Title'] = df.Name.str.split(',').str[1].str.split('.').str[0].str.strip()
df['IsWomanOrBoy'] = ((df.Title == 'Master') | (df.Sex == 'female'))
df['LastName'] = df.Name.str.split(',').str[0]

# Use transform on the 'Survived' column directly for 'WomanOrBoyCount'
df['WomanOrBoyCount'] = df.groupby('LastName')['Survived'].transform(lambda s: s[df.IsWomanOrBoy].fillna(0).count())
df['WomanOrBoyCount'] = np.where(df.IsWomanOrBoy, df.WomanOrBoyCount - 1, df.WomanOrBoyCount)

# Use transform on the 'Survived' column directly for 'FamilySurvivedCount'
df['FamilySurvivedCount'] = df.groupby('LastName')['Survived'].transform(lambda s: s[df.IsWomanOrBoy].fillna(0).sum())
df['FamilySurvivedCount'] = np.where(df.IsWomanOrBoy, df.FamilySurvivedCount - df.Survived.fillna(0), df.FamilySurvivedCount)

# Calculate 'WomanOrBoySurvived'
df['WomanOrBoySurvived'] = df['FamilySurvivedCount'] / df['WomanOrBoyCount'].replace(0, np.nan)
df.WomanOrBoyCount = df.WomanOrBoyCount.replace(np.nan, 0)
df['Alone'] = (df.WomanOrBoyCount == 0)

#Thanks to: https://www.kaggle.com/kpacocha/top-6-titanic-machine-learning-from-disaster
#"Title" improvement
df['Title'] = df['Title'].replace('Ms','Miss')
df['Title'] = df['Title'].replace('Mlle','Miss')
df['Title'] = df['Title'].replace('Mme','Mrs')
# Embarked
df['Embarked'] = df['Embarked'].fillna('S')

# Thanks to https://www.kaggle.com/erinsweet/simpledetect
# Fare
med_fare = df.groupby(['Pclass', 'Parch', 'SibSp'])['Fare'].median().loc[3, 0, 0]
df['Fare'] = df['Fare'].fillna(med_fare)

# Create a function to fill missing values in 'Age'
def fill_age_na(group):
    return group.fillna(group.median())

# Apply the function to fill missing values in 'Age'
df['Age'] = df.groupby(['Sex', 'Pclass', 'Title'])['Age'].transform(fill_age_na)

# Family_Size
df['Family_Size'] = df['SibSp'] + df['Parch'] + 1

#Thanks to https://www.kaggle.com/kpacocha/top-6-titanic-machine-learning-from-disaster
# Cabin, Deck
df['Deck'] = df['Cabin'].apply(lambda s: s[0] if pd.notnull(s) else 'M')
df.loc[(df['Deck'] == 'T'), 'Deck'] = 'A'

df.WomanOrBoySurvived = df.WomanOrBoySurvived.fillna(0)
df.WomanOrBoyCount = df.WomanOrBoyCount.fillna(0)
df.FamilySurvivedCount = df.FamilySurvivedCount.fillna(0)
df.Alone = df.Alone.fillna(0)
cells.rewritten:
df['Title'] = df.Name.str.split(',').str[1].str.split('.').str[0].str.strip()
df['IsWomanOrBoy'] = (df.Title == 'Master') | (df.Sex == 'female')
df['LastName'] = df.Name.str.split(',').str[0]
df['WomanOrBoyCount'] = df.groupby('LastName')['Survived'].transform(lambda
    s: s[df.IsWomanOrBoy].fillna(0).count())
df['WomanOrBoyCount'] = np.where(df.IsWomanOrBoy, df.WomanOrBoyCount - 1,
    df.WomanOrBoyCount)
df['FamilySurvivedCount'] = df.groupby('LastName')['Survived'].transform(lambda
    s: s[df.IsWomanOrBoy].fillna(0).sum())
df['FamilySurvivedCount'] = np.where(df.IsWomanOrBoy, df.
    FamilySurvivedCount - df.Survived.fillna(0), df.FamilySurvivedCount)
df['WomanOrBoySurvived'] = df['FamilySurvivedCount'] / df['WomanOrBoyCount'
    ].replace(0, np.nan)
df.WomanOrBoyCount = df.WomanOrBoyCount.replace(np.nan, 0)
df['Alone'] = df.WomanOrBoyCount == 0
df['Title'] = df['Title'].replace('Ms', 'Miss')
df['Title'] = df['Title'].replace('Mlle', 'Miss')
df['Title'] = df['Title'].replace('Mme', 'Mrs')
_DIAS_ser = df['Embarked']
if type(_DIAS_ser) != pd.Series:
    df['Embarked'] = df['Embarked'].fillna('S')
else:
    df['Embarked'].fillna('S', inplace=True)
med_fare = df.groupby(['Pclass', 'Parch', 'SibSp'])['Fare'].median().loc[3,
    0, 0]
_DIAS_ser = df['Fare']
if type(_DIAS_ser) != pd.Series:
    df['Fare'] = df['Fare'].fillna(med_fare)
else:
    df['Fare'].fillna(med_fare, inplace=True)
def fill_age_na(group):
    return group.fillna(group.median())
df['Age'] = df.groupby(['Sex', 'Pclass', 'Title'])['Age'].transform(fill_age_na
    )
df['Family_Size'] = df['SibSp'] + df['Parch'] + 1
df['Deck'] = df['Cabin'].apply(lambda s: s[0] if pd.notnull(s) else 'M')
df.loc[df['Deck'] == 'T', 'Deck'] = 'A'
df.WomanOrBoySurvived = df.WomanOrBoySurvived.fillna(0)
df.WomanOrBoyCount = df.WomanOrBoyCount.fillna(0)
df.FamilySurvivedCount = df.FamilySurvivedCount.fillna(0)
df.Alone = df.Alone.fillna(0)

cells.raw:
train_x, test_x = df.loc[traindf.index], df.loc[testdf.index]
test_x = test_x.drop('Survived', axis=1)

# %%time
# profile = train_x.profile_report(title='Pandas Profiling Report for training dataset')
# profile.to_file(output_file="train_profile.html")

# FIRST-AUTHOR: remove profiling
# %%time
# profile = ProfileReport(train_x, title='Pandas Profiling Report for training dataset', minimal=True)
# profile.to_file(output_file="train_short_profile.html")

# FIRST-AUTHOR: remove profiling
# ProfileReport(test_x, title='Pandas Profiling Report for test dataset')

# The one line of the code for prediction
test_x = pd.concat([test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived.fillna(0), test_x.Alone, \
                    test_x.Sex.replace({'male': 0, 'female': 1})], axis=1)
pd.DataFrame({'Survived': (((test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived <= 0.2381) & (test_x.Sex > 0.5) & (test_x.Alone > 0.5)) | \
                        ((test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived > 0.2381) & \
                       ~((test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived > 0.55) & (test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived <= 0.633)))).astype(int)}, index=testdf.index).reset_index().to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
cells.rewritten:

    test_x.Sex.replace({'male': 0, 'female': 1})], axis=1)
pd.DataFrame({'Survived': ((test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived <= 0.2381) & (test_x.
    Sex > 0.5) & (test_x.Alone > 0.5) | (test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived > 0.2381
    ) & ~((test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived > 0.55) & (test_x.WomanOrBoySurvived <=
    0.633))).astype(int)}, index=testdf.index).reset_index().to_csv(
    'submission.csv', index=False)
